metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: You enjoy modern crime dramas like 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS' but also appreciate a touch of mystery similar to 'The Night Manager'. Sherlock provides intelligent crime-solving with a captivating lead, aligning with your preference for engaging drama and mystery.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Given your appreciation for 'Brassic' and 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia', Barry offers a darkly comedic take on a hitman trying to become an actor. It blends humor with dramatic elements, creating a unique and compelling viewing experience.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Since you liked 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation', Dark is a complex, mind-bending sci-fi mystery with time travel and interconnected characters. It's a serious, well-crafted series that explores intricate themes and plotlines similar to your enjoyment of 'Stranger Things' mysterious elements but with a darker more adult undertone.

metas.name: The Venture Bros.
metas.description: You enjoy adult animation like 'Rick and Morty', 'Love, Death & Robots', and 'One-Punch Man'. 'The Venture Bros.' offers a unique blend of action, adventure, and dark humor, satirizing classic adventure tropes while providing a compelling and intricate story.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Considering your enjoyment of 'Love, Death & Robots', 'Fallout' and 'Stranger Things', Black Mirror is a critically acclaimed anthology series that explores dark and thought-provoking themes related to technology and society. Each episode presents a self-contained story with high production value, and shares the sci-fi/futuristic dystopia elements of the other shows.
